content.prompt: Which of the following best describes how the author organizes the reasoning of his argument in the opening lines of the passage (“Warned by the disaster . . . ever adopted by nations”) ?

choices.label: Arguing from specific cases to a general conclusion
Tracing a sequence of events resulting in a positive outcome
Pointing out the differences among various opinions
Drawing parallels between the current situation and a past crisis

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
